whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies
whatAreCookies.description: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit our website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide a better user experience.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Cookies
howWeUse.description: We use cookies for the following purposes:

managing.title: Managing Cookies
managing.description: You can control and manage cookies through your browser settings. Please note that removing or blocking cookies may impact your user experience and some parts of our website may no longer be fully accessible.
